Oh dear.  Must watch videos *before* starting on coffee.
Only video games are capable of delivering such gloriously wretched writing and acting. (And only video games can sometimes be forgiven for it.)
I hate these kinds of threads, I can't view Youtube videos at work.

@Iori Yeah, I saw that! I've never played MvC3 but it looked like that kid was owning a heck of a lot of guys more than twice his age. BTW, I still need to watch the SF4 finals. Shame to see Justin Wong and Daigo both not making the final four.

This is… Speed Halo

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=S_3Ul9NaZqM

@Jevous Neither have I, but that kid did some things that looked REALLY awesome. I am now keen to pick up Ultimate MVC3.

Was bummed Daigo didn't make the finals, but then again, next year he will be looking to regain his glory.

So this is surprising:  There's a new trailer for Rage out.  That's not the surprising bit.  The surprising bit is that it actually raises my excitement for the game about half a degree above absolute zero:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GFE66chCZuA

So I don't know if he posted it here (I don't see it), but @MrGenuchi sent me a link to a video for an upcoming XBLA/PSN shooter called Sine Mora, a collaboration between Grasshopper Manufacture and Hungarian developer Digital Reality:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=n6f1Ey7YQzM

Looks really nifty!  The aesthetic has been compared to Studio Ghibli (which is true), but it reminded me immediately of the world of Precursor Legacy (you know, before Jak went all angsty).
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1GhNXHCQGsM
Wow, that's amazing.
